parties.title: Anna's Birthday Dinner
parties.welcomeMessage: You are cordially invited to celebrate Anna's birthday with an evening of fine dining, delightful company, and unforgettable memories. We have prepared a special menu and entertainment for your enjoyment. Please arrive on time and dress to impress. We look forward to celebrating this special occasion with you!

games.name: Murder Mystery Dinner
games.description: Get ready for an evening of intrigue and deception! Each guest will receive a character card with a secret identity. Someone among us is a murderer, and it's up to you to figure out who before the night ends. Clues will be revealed throughout the evening. Pay attention to conversations, watch for suspicious behavior, and don't trust anyone too quickly!

games.name: Two Truths and a Lie
games.description: A classic icebreaker with a twist! Each person shares three statements about themselves - two true and one false. The group must guess which statement is the lie. Prepare your most convincing poker face!
